title: 11/23/20 DPS-BEST OF
itunes:title: 11/23/20 DPS-BEST OF
description:
On Today's episode of the Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps the weekend that was in sports. Did the Bengals overexpose Joe Burrow? Was Dabo Swinney right to be upset about the FSU/Clemson cancelation? We're joined by NBC's Chris Simms, ESPN's Saints reporter Mike Triplett, and Sports Illustrated's Chris Mannix. Plus, who's been the biggest winner of the NBA Offseason thus far?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
